ondisc 0.9.0
  • Function reference

Reference

Initialize

Initialize an on_disc_matrix from raw count data or from an existing on_disc_matrix.h5 file.

Obtain basic information

Obtain basic information from an on_disc_matrix, like gene names and cell barcodes.

Accumulator function Enum Function to return a simple enum of the accumulator functions

arguments_enum()

symbols_enum()

Covariate Enum Function to return a simple "enum" of all symbols (terminal and nonterminal) used in the grammar; helps to reduce number of string literals in the code.

Subset, extract submatrix

Subset an on_disc_matrix, or pull a submatrix of an on_disc_matrix into memory.

`[`(<ondisc_matrix>,<missing>,<missing>,<missing>) `[`(<ondisc_matrix>,<ANY>,<missing>,<missing>) `[`(<ondisc_matrix>,<missing>,<ANY>,<missing>) `[`(<ondisc_matrix>,<ANY>,<ANY>,<missing>)

Operate on all rows or columns

Obtain gene-wise and cell-wise summary statistics.

Interface with other packages
